item.title: Announcing My First VS Code Extension: textmate.rstheme
item.description: TL;DR: I published my first VS Code extension/theme on Visual Studio Marketplace, with the source hosted on GitHub. Try it out today. A screenshot for editing R Markdown documents with the theme. Syntax highlighting provided by vscode-R. Captured with IBM Plex Mono at 18px. It was not until late in my life that I realized my eyes were sensitive to the visual aesthetics of things. To make things worse, I care about them very much, at least in the name of productivity and inspiration.
